vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
θῡμί-ᾱμα,
Ionic dialect θῡμί-ημα, ατος, τό, incense, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; name of a particular kind (perhaps = ἀμμωνιακόν), [Refs]: usually in plural, fragrant stuffs for burning, [NT+5th c.BC+]; -ιάματα ἑρπετῶν fumigations, [Refs 3rd c.AD+]
__2 stuff for embalming, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: incense; burning incense, offering of incense
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
incense; burning incense, offering of incense
incense, any odoriferous substance burnt in religious worship, Rev. 5:8; 8:3, 4; 18:13; or, the act of burning incense, Lk. 1:10, 11*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 用來點燃散發香氣的物質, 香
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 用来点燃散发香气的物质, 香
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: hương; hương thơm; hương thơm cháy
